channel.title: til unix gpg on
channel.description: Recent content in til unix gpg on

item.title: encription with gpg
item.description: Generate key gpg --gen-key List keys gpg --list-keys Encrypt Data With a passprhare gpg -ca -o output.txt.gpg input.txt with a certificate and from STDOUT gpg -ea or if you know the name already (can be key, name or email) gpg -ea -r "Ahmy" Decrypt Data gpg -d file.txt.gpg Export Public key gpg --export -a "name" > public.key -a is to create armored ascii output.
